segments.text: Well , I bought this skirt here yesterday afternoon . But I got the wrong size . It ’ s too small for my daughter . I wonder if I could refund it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you could if it's kept intact . But don't you want to get a bigger size ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I intended to , but as far as I know , all the skirts of this kind here are of the same size .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are they ? In that case , I'll be glad to give your money back .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry to have given you trouble .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Never mind . It ’ s just my duty .
segments.speaker: S2
